JUSTICE B.KEMAL PASHA FRIDAY, THE 5TH DAY OF JANUARY 2018 / 15TH POUSHA, 1939 Cr1.MC.No. 1630 of 2017 cc. NO.827/2016 OF JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT, MUVATTUPUZHA. CRIME NO. 561/2016 OF MUVATTUPUZHA POLICE STATION. PETITIONER: SURESH BABU, AGED 54 YEARS, S/O.HEMACHANDRAN, SREEPADMAM, T.K.M.C. P.O, PEROOR, KOLLAM-5. BY ADVS.SRI.R.MOHANA BABU, SRI.M.AJITH (KARICODE) . RESPONDENT (S) : 1 STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM-682 031. 2 PAUL MATHEW, AGED 38 YEARS, S/O.M.C. MATHEW, MAMBILLIKKUZHIYIL HOUSE, SOUTH MARADY P.O, MUVATTUPUZHA, ERNAKULAM -686 673. R1 BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SRI.T.R. RENJITH R2 BY ADV. SRI.T.R.RAJESH. THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING BEEN FINALLY HEARD ON 05-01-2018, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: rs. es Beene 2018/KER/475 Cr1l.MC.No. 1630 of 2017 () APPENDIX PETITIONER'S ANNEXURES: ANNX.A TRUE COPY OF THE FIR IN CRIME NO.561/2016 OF MUVATTUPUZHA POLICE STATION AND COMPLAINT OF 2ND RESPONDENT. ANNX .B TRUE COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT IN CRIME NO.561/2016 OF THE MUVATTUPUZHA POLICE STATION DATED 14.06.2016. ANNX.C TRUE COPY OF THE PETITION DATED 21.02.2016 FILED BY PETITIONER TO THE SI OF POLICE, KILIKOLLUR. RESPONDENT'S ANNEXURES: NIL. //TRUE copy// P.S. TO JUDGE rs. REALE DO1s/RERIATS B. KEMAL PASHA, J. Dated this the 5 day of January, 2018 ORDER Petitioner is the accused in C.C.No.827/2016 of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court, Muvattupuzha based on Annexure-B final report in Crime No.561/2016 of the Muvattupuzha Police Station for the offence under Section 506(i) IPC. On hearing either sides, it seems that the arguments forwarded by the learned counsel for the petitioner cannot be considered at present, since those arguments are based on the merits of the case. The petitioner can take up all these contentions before the trial court at appropriate stage. With liberty to the petitioner to take up these contentions at appropriate stage before the trial court, this CrIl.M.C. is disposed of. As far as practicable, the court below shall grant exemption to the petitioners from _ personal appearance. Sd/- B. KEMAL PASHA, JUDGE. se // True Copy // P.A. to Judge
